MyPage.WithdrawInfo: If you have deleted your account for fraudulent purposes, you will not be able to rejoin Starter Kit. The retention period for member information is as follows:
MyPage.UnlinkWarning: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
MyPage.EmptyClassroom: When you enroll in a class, it will appear here.
MyPage.WithdrawNotice: Please read this carefully before deleting your account.
MyPage.WithdrawAgreement: I confirm that I have read, understand, and agree to the notification above and that all my account information, including remaining points, promotions, coupons, and class access, will not be restored when I delete my account.
MyPage.NoticeDescription1: This class will be available from {startAt}.
MyPage.NoticeDescription2: Class expired. This class expired on {endAt} and is no longer available.
MyPage.NoticeDescription3: For more information, please send us an email to {email}
MyPage.WithdrawInfoLabel1: • Records of withdrawal of contract or subscription Reasons for preservation
MyPage.WithdrawInfoLabel2: • Records of payments and supply of goods
MyPage.WithdrawInfoLabel3: •Records of complaints or dispute handling by consumers
MyPage.WithdrawInfoLabel4: • Records of complaints or dispute handling by consumers
MyPage.WithdrawDescription:
Once you delete your account, your coupons and points will be permanently deleted and cannot be restored.
If you have refundable credits, please contact our help center for a refund request before deleting your account.
Deletion of your account is permanent and cannot be undone.
However, following the related Act and subordinate statute provisions, Starter Kit will store the account information for a set period of time.
MyPage.ResetPasswordDescription:
We will send you an email with the link to reset your password.
Once you reset your password, you will be able to sign in to the account using your new password.
MyPage.UnlinkSuccessDescription:
You have unlinked your account.
If you want to continue using this account, click [Reset password],
f you want to delete your account, click [Delete account].
MyPage.UnlinkWarningDescription:
Once your account is deleted, you can no longer sign in to your account and will lose all access to your class and coupons associated with this account.
Deletion of your account and personal data is permanent and irreversible.
Starter Kit will not be able to recover your account or the deleted data.
Would you still want to proceed?
MyPage.WithdrawInfoDescription1:
The Consumer Protection Act on e-commerce
Retention period: 5 years
MyPage.WithdrawInfoDescription2:
Reasons for preservation: The Consumer Protection Act on e-commerce
Retention period: 5 years
MyPage.WithdrawInfoDescription3:
Reasons for preservation: The Consumer Protection Act on e-commerce.
Retention period: 3 years
MyPage.WithdrawInfoDescription4:
Reasons for preservation: The Consumer Protection Act on e-commerce
Retention period: 3 years

MyPage.ResetPasswordSuccessDescription:
We have sent an email to the address {email} to reset your password.
Once you reset your password, you will be able to sign in again with your new password.

AccountSystem.HibernatedUserInformationDescription:
Hello, this is StarterKit. Your account has been deactivated.
If you wish to reactivate your account, please find/reset your password.
If there is no sign-in record for one year after the transition to deactivation, your account will be permanently deleted, and cannot be recovered.
Please continue enjoying a variety of StarterKit services with your account reactivation.
(Accounts with payment details will be deleted after the legal retention period.)

Thank you.

ex) If you sign up on June 1st, you can use it until June 30th at 23:59

extras.additionalText1:
Get exclusive tips and insights from Concept Artist Soyoong
throughout 10 online classes.
extras.additionalText2: Requires a basic understanding of Adobe Photoshop CC.

assets.name: Important Notice_Class Content Usage Guide (Please Read).pdf

extras.additionalText1: CAPCOM, UBISOFT 등의 유명 게임 회사를 거친 3D 캐릭터 아티스트 차호경의 크리처 제작 노하우를 20회차에 걸친 온라인 교육으로 제공합니다.
extras.additionalText2: 한 번 구매로 3D 캐릭터 아티스트 차호경의 Zbrush를 활용한 크리처 스컬프팅 노하우를 담은 동영상 강의 20개가 영원히 내 것이 됩니다.
extras.additionalText3: 콜로소 '최초' 크리처 모델링 클래스! 오직 Zbrush툴만을 이용해 스컬프팅의 기본기부터 실무자 수준의 중급 판타지 크리처까지 한 번에 모두 만들어볼 수 있습니다.
